name: Shimla
description: Shimla is the capital city of Himachal Pradesh and one of India's most popular hill stations. Known for its colonial architecture, scenic beauty, and pleasant climate, it offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and natural beauty.

locations.name: The Ridge
locations.description: The Ridge is a large open space in the heart of Shimla, offering panoramic views of the surrounding mountains. It's a popular spot for locals and tourists alike.

travelTips.bestTime: March to June and September to November - pleasant weather for sightseeing
travelTips.transportation: Walking distance from Mall Road, easily accessible by local transport
travelTips.accommodation: Multiple hotels and guesthouses available in the vicinity

locations.name: Mall Road
locations.description: Mall Road is the main shopping street of Shimla, lined with shops, restaurants, and colonial buildings. It's a pedestrian-only zone and a great place to experience the local culture.

travelTips.bestTime: October to June - best shopping experience
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - most shops accept cards
travelTips.transportation: Walking distance from The Ridge, no vehicles allowed

locations.name: Christ Church
locations.description: Christ Church is the second oldest church in North India, known for its neo-Gothic architecture and beautiful stained glass windows.

travelTips.bestTime: Year-round, but especially beautiful during Christmas
travelTips.accommodation: Multiple options available in the area

locations.name: Jakhu Temple
locations.description: Jakhu Temple is an ancient temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman, located at the highest point in Shimla. It offers breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains.

travelTips.bestTime: Early morning for sunrise views and fewer crowds
travelTips.transportation: Trekking path available, can also take a taxi
travelTips.accommodation: Stay in Shimla town and visit as a day trip

locations.name: Kufri
locations.description: Kufri is a small hill station near Shimla, known for its skiing slopes and panoramic views of the Himalayas. It's a popular destination for adventure activities.

travelTips.bestTime: December to February for snow activities, March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for activities
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Shimla
travelTips.accommodation: Limited options in Kufri, better to stay in Shimla
